trans-unit.source: Provides the transition to a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> in a state machine workflow.
trans-unit.target: 로 전환을 제공는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> 상태 시스템 워크플로의 합니다.
이 클래스는 상속 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The SetStateActivity can be used only in state machine workflows.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]SetStateActivity 상태 시스템 워크플로에서 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The SetStateActivity provides transitions only to leaf <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> activities (a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> that does not contain other <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> activities).
trans-unit.target: SetStateActivity 제공으로 전환만 리프 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>활동 (한 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>다른을 포함 하지 않는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>활동).</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>

trans-unit.source: The SetStateActivity only provides transitions between two <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> classes and does not support <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> to parent <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> transitions or any other combination.
trans-unit.target: SetStateActivity 두 사이의 전환을 제공 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>클래스와 지원 되지 않습니다 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>부모 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>전환 또는 이외의 다른 조합.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>

trans-unit.source: The SetStateActivity has to be a leaf node within the activity tree of an event handler.
trans-unit.target: SetStateActivity는 이벤트 처리기의 활동 트리 내에 있는 리프 노드여야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: There can be more than one SetStateActivity but all the activities must be leaf nodes.
trans-unit.target: 둘 이상의 SetStateActivity 있을 수 있지만 모든 활동 리프 노드여야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: SetStateActivity is always the last activity in the run path of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: SetStateActivity의 실행된 경로에 있는 마지막 활동은 항상 한 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>활동.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity"> </xref> 클래스 활동의 이름을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
Gets or sets the name of the target state.
trans-unit.target: 대상 상태의 이름을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the target stream.
Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity.TargetStateName*> property.
